titleStmt.title: By the Kynge and the Queene the Quenes moste excellent maiestie, being credibly enformid, that not withstanding dyuers of Her Highnes restraintes, and proclamations lately made and sette furthe, aswell for the stay from goynge to the sea of shyppes ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Iohannis Cavvodi Tipographi Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first four lines of text.
"Geuen at our manor of Grenewich the thirde day of Maye."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
